channel.title: Server status problem
channel.description:
Well i recently tried adding my server to the status page and it was banned.
I contacted moparisbest & got no reply after about 2 months.
It is still banned can anyone help me.
I didn't do anything to brake the rules.
So please don't lock this thread
I had opened one on moparscape general discussion and it got locked saying there is already a thread about it. I searched all over moparscape for this thread and found nothing
so if someone can help me it would be great.

item.title: Server status problem
item.dc:creator: @soccerjunki12 soccerjunki12
